item.title: [ 32] AI Pokemon Thread /NAPT/ Thread 176: Cold, Cruel Fate Edition
item.description:
This is a general thread for people to post their AI art, and make requests from others who may want to attempt making their own Pokemon related gens.

NovelAI is a paid AI generator. Opus tier users have "unlimited" Small/Normal generations, though editing tools require credits.

Microsoft's Bing AI is a free image generator that is powered by DALL·E 3.

Civitai is free using its ‘buzz’ currency. You get about 50 every day plus more for liking models and gens.
>civitai.com

Otaiku is a (mostly) free mobile app. An ad watch is required between each image generation unless you pay.
>ailla.biz/otaiku

Tensor is free to use as well, although you are limited to how many gens you can make per day.
>https://tensor.art/

Local Generation using Stable Diffusion requires a decent video card. Guides for local genning can be found in the /g/ threads:
>>>/g/sdg
>>>/g/ldg
Other Stable Diffusion threads are on: /h/, /e/, /d/, /b/, /vt/, /aco/, /trash/

Hailuo AI takes uploaded art and animates them based on the prompts you get. You get a 3-day free trial, followed by roughly 3 free gens a day afterward. Subscription plans are available.
>https://hailuoai.video/

Pastebin of Pokemon artists:
>https://pastebin.com/U0mmK3Tm (embed)

Characters with under 300 images will require more tags to have them look correct. This is a list of all Pokemon characters with over 300 images:
>https://danbooru.donmai.us/posts?tags=*_%28pokemon%29+&z=5

If you plan on sharing multiple images together, we'd recommend posting just one, and give links for the rest. This way we can conserve space.

This is a locally run html tool provided by ThatOneAiAnon. It keeps track of all artists you like and turns Danbooru's entire tag system in a collapsible list of buttons. You can edit all the js, css, html code to modify the tool. (Ask him for updated versions or more Nai4 tools)
>mega .nz/file/67xwTRSB#m0fPUmJRaWd3oh47gt6nw2LKNMe820TaiKdXTAhx8tI

Previous Thread: >>57694696

Original filename: Articuno.png
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [105] No mercy controversy discussion
item.description:
Why is self expression of fetishes through video games considered harmful when porn of such fetishes is still legal?

If governments have the right to censor such media in the event of outrage then what prevents them from censoring everything that they don't deem kosher?

item.title: [ 32] God Sqauresoft was fucking kino
item.description:
I don't know man. Something about SS games felt so premium and high class. I don't know how to describe it exactly, every game they game they released (even thr shitty ones) were oozing magic and wonder. Final Fantasy III, IV, V, VIII, IX, XI, Tactics, The Mana serise (Trials and Legends specifically), the First Kingdom Hearts, the SaGa games, they all are so god damn whimsical it's unreal.

Original filename: Square_Soft_logo.png

item.title: [115] /pcbg/ - PC Building General
item.description:
HELP ME NVIDIA IS HOLOCAUSTING THE GPU MARKET edition

News:
-Nvidia 5060/5060ti cards are shit.
-gossip of the day: 9070xtx monster card coming? (source: I've seen it in my dream)
-british scientists say Nvidia users have 4,4" penile length on average

>UPGRADE & BUILD ADVICE
Post build list or current specs including MONITOR: https://pcpartpicker.com/
Provide specific use cases (e.g. 4K editing, high FPS gaming)
State budget and COUNTRY or you will not be helped

>12VHPWR
If a 12VHPWR connector is not fully seated in its socket, the connection can melt.
Do not use aftermarket cables or adapters.

>Intel Raptor Lake / RPL Refresh
Instability reported with 13th and 14th gen, i5 K SKUs and above (incl non-K). Update BIOS and apply Intel Baseline settings. Avoid purchases.

>CPUS
HTPC(4K60)/Web Browsing: i3 12100
Gaming: R5 7600; budget: i5 13400; eXtreme: R7 9800X3D
Multicore: R9 7950X; budget: i5 13400
>Avoid iGPU-less CPUs
>Existing AM4 board with an old chip? Consider a Zen 3 CPU

>GRAPHICS CARDS (@MSRP)
1080p: fx5500 ; 9070
1440p: 9070 ; RT: 9070xt
2160p: RTX 5090 (lmao paypigs); budget: 9070xt

(9070XT -IT'S BITCHIN FAST)

>RAM
DDR4: Zen3/AM4 - 2x 16GB 3600 MT/s CL18; for locked "non-K" 12th/13th/LGA1700 - 2x 16GB 3200 MT/s CL16
DDR5: Zen4/AM5 - 2x 16GB 6000 MT/s CL30; for unlocked "K" 13th/14th/LGA1700 - 2x 16GB 6400MT/s CL32

>COOLERS
Thermaltake Phantom Spirit (or variant), Thermaltake Frozen Prism

>PSUS
A new PSU should be ATX 3.1 compliant
Aim for 50-75% PSU utilization at full system load
https://hwbusters.com/best_picks/best-atxv3-pcie5-ready-psus-picks-hardware-busters/

>SSDS
WD SN5000 2 TB, Samsung 990 Pro 2 TB
Avoid: cheapest NVMe SSDs
https://ssd.borecraft.com/

>MOTHERBOARDS
Good power delivery is required for Intel CPUs like the i5 13600K and above
Don't pair a K CPU with a B mobo chipset

>GAMING MONITORS
AOC Q27G3XMN, MSI MPG 321URX
https://pcpartpicker.com/user/pcbg/saved/dP3v4D

Previous: >>105009671

Original filename: 1663085439300714.jpg
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [156] /vp/ plays Pokemon Academy Life Forever
item.description:
LAST TIME:
>RG finished his post loop run
>Bunken has a date with Tia
>John continues losing his mind over the maddening idiocy that is Rejuvenation
>Orion continues through Unbound, reaching the retarded Normal gym
>Ashime trudges ahead
>Wagie gets jewed by his boss
>Meanwhile I suffer heartache and pain as psybros lose harder than ever

>What is this?
This is a thread where a bunch of autists come together and play shitty fangames. Join if you want.

>How do I join?
Just make a name and/or tripcode and start posting images of whatever fangame/romhack you're playing.

item.title: [ 91] /fwt/ - Friendly Windows Thread
item.description:
FAQ:
>How do I activate Windows?
github.com/massgravel/Microsoft-Activation-Scripts
HWID2 generates and registers a permanent legitimate license on MS's activation servers
Usage: paste into Powershell, run.
irm https://get.activated.win | iex

>and Office?
Same method, use Ohook
You can also use Office.com if your needs are very minimal
or try OnlyOffice/LibreOffice and set it to save in MSOffice file formats

>What version should I install?
W10 Enterprise IoT LTSC 2021
>Binary identical to Enterprise except no MS Store or apps
>Can install MS Store from cmd with: wsreset -i
>Alternatively use winget for apps
>Preinstalled with: Edge & Win32 system apps
>10 years support on "IoT LTSC", 5 for "LTSC"
>Manual version upgrades

W11 Enterprise IoT LTSC 2024
>Same as W10 version except:
>UI written in React Native aka JavaScript including: Start, Taskbar and Explorer that lags even on i9s
>Use only if you fell for the 12th+ gen Intel meme and need the new CPU scheduler

W10/W11 Home/Pro/Education/Enterprise/Enterprise IoT
>Preinstalled with: Edge, Win32 system apps, MS Store, OneDrive, Weather, Movies, Music, Netflix, Amazon, Spotify, Candy Crush, etc
>Auto-reinstalls apps on feature updates
>1.5-3 years support
>Forced version upgrades

>ISOs:
Windows IoT LTSC https://pastebin.com/ywkasnhM
Windows https://pastebin.com/nUMgAr0b
Office https://pastebin.com/G8w5qu6z

>Should I debloat / build my own ISO?
If you need to ask, then no.
If you know what you're doing:
https://pastebin.com/S5VKBirt

>Portable programs & reinstall-proofing
https://pastebin.com/Zh7WSbJ2

>Useful programs (new installs, essentials, utilities, adobe, etc)
https://pastebin.com/hN8nnwns

>I miss Windows##
OpenShell/RetroBar/WinClassic/StartIsBack


>LTSC Install Guides
https://rentry.org/windowsinstallguide
https://rentry.org/concisewin10
https://rentry.org/ltsc

https://rentry.org/fwt (hijacked)

Previously on /fwt/: >>104965190

item.title: [ 99] Trump announces 90-day pause on ‘reciprocal’ tariffs with exception of China
item.description:
https://www.cnn.com/2025/04/09/business/reciprocal-tariff-pause-trump/index.html
President Donald Trump announced a complete pause on all the “reciprocal” tariffs that went into effect at midnight, with the exception of China.

Tariffs on China will be increased to 125% from 104%, he said.

Trump in a Truth Social post Wednesday said he has “authorized a 90 day PAUSE, and a substantially lowered Reciprocal Tariff during this period, of 10%, also effective immediately.”

“Based on the lack of respect that China has shown to the World’s Markets, I am hereby raising the Tariff charged to China by the United States of America to 125%, effective immediately,” Trump said in his social media post. “At some point, hopefully in the near future, China will realize that the days of ripping off the U.S.A., and other Countries, is no longer sustainable or acceptable,” he wrote.

Stocks rocketed higher on the news, with the Dow surging 2,200 points, or 5.9%. The S&P 500 rose 6.5% and the Nasdaq was more than 8% higher.

Trump, however, did not indicate he was pausing the 10% universal tariff on all trading partners, with the exception of Canada and Mexico, that went into effect over the weekend. Therefore, countries that were subjects of reciprocal tariffs will continue to have a 10% tariff levied on them.

Original filename: 1743562230347138.jpg
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [109] White House Confirms Trump Is Exploring Ways To ‘Deport’ U.S. Citizens
item.description:
https://www.huffpost.com/entry/white-house-confirms-trump-is-exploring-ways-to-deport-us-citizens_n_67f580abe4b0a5ea5c7608d2

White House press secretary Karoline Leavitt said Tuesday that President Donald Trump is exploring legal pathways to “deport” U.S. citizens to El Salvador, where the administration has already arranged to house deported immigrants in a prison known for its human rights abuses. (Watch the video, above.)

Leavitt suggested the effort would be limited to people who have committed major crimes, but Trump has also mentioned the possibility of sending people who commit lesser offenses abroad.

Any such move on the part of the Trump administration is certain to be challenged in court. It is also not clear what legal authority could be used to justify expelling U.S. citizens from their homeland.

“These would be heinous, violent criminals who have broken our nation’s laws repeatedly. These are violent, repeat offenders on American streets,” Leavitt told reporters at a press briefing.

“The president has said if it’s legal, right, if there is a legal pathway to do that. He’s not sure, [and] we are not sure if there is,” Leavitt continued. “It’s an idea that he has simply floated and has discussed very publicly in the effort of transparency.”

Original filename: 1740778791723484.png

item.title: [202] Working on my Pokémon Fangame where almost everything is a submission, replaci
item.description:
Working on my Pokémon Fangame where almost everything is a submission, replacing vanilla types, mons, abilities, moves etc.

Took a bit to make a new thread, as I was catching up on implementing mons, abilities and moves

Main Doc: https://scrawny-crustacean-f0d.notion.site/Unnamed-Pkmn-Game-1b5b9ecf5b6e80d5889dda00b4bf40e7

Typechart: https://files.catbox.moe/7ii2eb.png

Pokemon Doc: https://scrawny-crustacean-f0d.notion.site/1bab9ecf5b6e80bcbb9fd4c2994a4c4a?v=1bab9ecf5b6e802b8b92000c0d380208

Moves Doc: https://scrawny-crustacean-f0d.notion.site/1b5b9ecf5b6e8035baaae94d16ef813c?v=1b5b9ecf5b6e80b3b9ae000c5e27a560

Abilities Doc: https://scrawny-crustacean-f0d.notion.site/1b5b9ecf5b6e80cca0f9c5ce94ef9049?v=1b5b9ecf5b6e80998e35000cd4cddfd0

Currently open for submissions for:
- Type chart effectiveness changes
- Moves
- Abilities
- Items
- Sprites/Backsprites for mons/items without Sprites (See docs)
- Menu Sprites (128x64)
- Pokémon
- Name for the Project

Most of the submission options don't have a template since they're rather simple so don't need one, only Pokémon submissions:

>Name*:
>Type(s)*:
>Stats*:
>Move(s)*:
>Abilitiy/ies*:
>Growth Rate*:
>BaseXP:
>EVs:
>Catch Rate:
>Base Happiness:
>Height:
>Weight:
>Egg Group(s):
>Hatch Steps:
>Category+Pokedex*:
>Front Sprite*:
>Backsprite:
>Shiny:
>Wild held Item(s):
>Cry:
>Evolves To/Method:
>Evolves from:
*Required
Send links to sprites

Addionally open for discussions on:
- Project Name
- Important Earlygame Trainers

If you're interested in contributing but don't have any original ideas, you can also fill in requests, listed here:
https://scrawny-crustacean-f0d.notion.site/1c9b9ecf5b6e8089894ae49d5ef6dc23?v=1c9b9ecf5b6e8077b452000cede46188

These were mentioned previously in the request tab, but looking for starter evos as they are round-robin:
https://files.catbox.moe/od67sa.png

Previous thread: >>57622967

item.title: [ 72] Climbing
item.description:
It's been almost a year since the last thread was started. The thread on /xs/ is overwhelmingly focused on gym climbing and there are still a couple people who go /out/ to climb so what the hell. Help out by sharing trip reports, photos, advice, etc.

A place to talk about outdoor climbing in any aspect (trad, sport, bouldering, aid, alpine, etc).

Climbing is inherently dangerous but so are lots of things. Climb at your own risk.

Off-belay:
https://archived.moe/out/thread/2728649

item.title: [ 51] Serious Time Thread: 3/12/2025 #1 IF SHTF
item.description:
Internet goes out, possibly the power.

What literature are you saving?

What items other then guns do you have?

Medication knowledge?

Herb and plant life?

Most important things to have in your area?

You know the saying "hope for the best, prepare for the worst"

help your fellow anons out, leave some good suggestions please.

item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [ 42] Vietnam Beach Vacation
item.description:
I've got my destinations narrowed down to
>Da Nang
>Quy Nhon
>Nha Trang
>Phu Quoc
I think I'll probably just get a nice hotel near the beach in Da Nang and Nha Trang for 1 month each, but any other suggestions, thoughts, unexpected implications? People say Nha Trang is uneventful but I booked a really nice place really cheap there and it looks like the kind of place I can get good access to beaches, city and nature so it looks good to me.
